cobblemon.move.banishingfist.desc: The User enchants their fist, before striking their opponent with a powerful sealing attack, this move has a high critical hit ratio.
cobblemon.move.bansheesscream.desc: The user lets out a terrifying whail, this might cause the opposing pokemon to faint in three turns.
cobblemon.move.barbedtackle.desc: The user rams into an opponent with the poisoned points on its body. This may also poison the target.
cobblemon.move.barrierlight.desc: The user throws up a sturdy wall that sharply raises its Defense stat.
cobblemon.move.basilisksglare.desc: The user glares and petrifies the foe, turning them into the Rock-type.
cobblemon.move.bassdropfinale.desc: The user amps up its Z-Power before stopping and suddenly hitting the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

cobblemon.move.batteringram.desc: The user performs a tackle like a battering ram. It can also break barriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.
cobblemon.move.battlecry.desc: The user screams out a battle cry, raising the Attack stat of any adjacent ally Pokemon.
cobblemon.move.beampulser.desc: The user shoots a concentrated beam of fairy energy at its target.

cobblemon.move.beguile.desc: A sneak attack that will faint an infatuated foe.

cobblemon.move.bitcrunched.desc: The user crunches up the target with sharp ???. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

cobblemon.move.blackout.desc: Smothers the foe with vile energy. May inflict sleep.

cobblemon.move.blazinghoof.desc: The user throws a kick at a blinding speed at the target.

cobblemon.move.blisteringshield.desc: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also damages Ice Type attackers that makes direct contact.

cobblemon.move.bloodtransfusion.desc: An attack that harvest the target's blood. The user or the ally with the lowest health's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

cobblemon.move.bramblebash.desc: A thorny wallop that sends the user into a rage.

cobblemon.move.brightbreak.desc: The user strikes the target's weakspot with light power. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.
cobblemon.move.bufu.desc: Light Ice damage with Low chance to freeze

cobblemon.move.bufula.desc: Medium Ice damage with Low chance to freeze

cobblemon.move.spaceslam.desc: The user gathers its cosmic energy and attacks the target with it. This move's power is doubled in gravity.
cobblemon.move.spaciumbeam.desc: The target is struck with a beam of cosmic energy.
cobblemon.move.spaghettification.desc: A vicious wave of cosmic energy breaks the fabric of the target. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.
cobblemon.move.spam.desc: The user sends a barrage of spam email at the target two to five times in a row.
cobblemon.move.sparklingariasound.desc: The user bursts into song, emitting many bubbles. The move may use Water-Type or Sound-Type. Any Pokémon suffering from a burn will be healed by the touch of these bubbles.
cobblemon.move.spectralsap.desc: A draining attack that steals stat changes from the foe.
cobblemon.move.speedmite.desc: The user smashes into the target at high speed. This move always goes first.
cobblemon.move.spindash.desc: The User revvs up into a spiked ball, before bolting at the Target. This move always goes first.
cobblemon.move.spiralheatray.desc: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers nuclear energy, then blasts a bundled beam on the next turn.
cobblemon.move.spiritaway.desc: The target is whisked away, returning on the next turn. The target cannot attack during this time.
cobblemon.move.spookysound.desc: Letting out a scary shriek, the user scares the target and lowers its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.
cobblemon.move.spotlightlight.desc: The user shines a spotlight on the target so that only the target will be attacked during the turn.
cobblemon.move.sprinkle.desc: The user coats the field with fairy dust for five turns, giving all Fairy-type pokemon a 25% buff to Special Defense.
cobblemon.move.squallstrike.desc: The target is attacked with a violent strike that produces a gust of wind. This may also leave the target confused.
cobblemon.move.squeezehug.desc: The user wraps their limbs around the target and squeezes them for four to five turns.
cobblemon.move.squishpunch.desc: The user punches the target with its slimey duplicates. The lower the health of the user the greater the number of attacks.
cobblemon.move.squishstrike.desc: The user attacks the target with its slimey duplicates. The lower the health of the user the greater the number of attacks.
cobblemon.move.sssslash.desc: Hits twice. On the second turn, the user hits the target with a glitchy mess of code in the shape of a blade. Critical hits land more easily.
cobblemon.move.standoff.desc: The user initiates a duel. Both Pokémon may only attack and cannot switch until one of them has fainted.
cobblemon.move.starburstdragon.desc: The user attacks with a stellar explosion using its higher attack stat, even if the target protects itself.
cobblemon.move.starburstfairy.desc: The user attacks with a stellar explosion using its higher attack stat, even if the target protects itself.
cobblemon.move.starburstsound.desc: The user attacks with a stellar explosion using its higher attack stat, even if the target protects itself.
cobblemon.move.stardust.desc: The user causes a shower of stars to rain down on foes.
cobblemon.move.stardustcosmic.desc: The user causes a shower of stars to rain down on foes.
cobblemon.move.starlightshower.desc: The user shoots cosmic energy from their fists at the target two to five times in a row.
cobblemon.move.starshot.desc: Gathering cosmic energy, the user attacks the target. This move always goes first when Gravity is increased.
cobblemon.move.starstorm.desc: Rain down cosmic fury on the foe. Bypasses protect.
cobblemon.move.starstormcosmic.desc: Rain down cosmic fury on the foe. Bypasses protect.
cobblemon.move.stingfreeze.desc: The user attacks by shooting frost pins at the target. They may also leave the target with paralysis.
cobblemon.move.stormbomb.desc: A compacted storm is summoned down from the sky onto the target. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
cobblemon.move.stormforecast.desc: Two turns after this move is used, a zap of electricity attacks the target.
cobblemon.move.stretch.desc: The user takes a deep breath and pumps itself up with a stretch to raise its Attack, Speed and Evasion.
cobblemon.move.subduction.desc: The user creates a massive earthquake that causes the land underneath the foe to rise up and crash down, inflicting damage.
cobblemon.move.subwoofer.desc: Low pitched noises attack the opposing team to inflict damage. They may also make the targets flinch.
cobblemon.move.suddenstrike.desc: The user attacks the target suddenly and without mercy.
cobblemon.move.sugarrush.desc: The user ate tons of sweets and then rushes the target. This also damages the user quite a lot.
cobblemon.move.suitup.desc: The user puts on a layer of protective space gear to raise its Defense and Sp. Def stats.
cobblemon.move.sulfuricspray.desc: The user sprays the target. This attack ignores Steel-Type's immunity to Poison-Type.
cobblemon.move.sunbath.desc: The user lays down and takes in the solar energy to heal its wounds, the user restores its own HP by half of its max HP.
cobblemon.move.supercell.desc: Summons a five-thurn thunderstorm that will boost the power of electric types.
cobblemon.move.superembomber.desc: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers magnetic energy, then blasts a bundled beam on the next turn. The move may use Electric-Type or Steel-Type.
cobblemon.move.superluminalstrike.desc: The user charges at its target at lightspeed. This move always goes first.
cobblemon.move.supernova.desc: The user attacks everything around it by causing a tremendous explosion. The user faints upon using this move.
cobblemon.move.supernovaimplosion.desc: The user channels its Z-Power and slams onto the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.
cobblemon.move.supersonicsound.desc: The user generates odd sound waves from its body that confuse the target.
cobblemon.move.superstar.desc: The user creates an 8-Bit shining star that makes them temporarily invincible and then it charges into the target. The user can't move next turn.
cobblemon.move.supremecannon.desc: A powerful energy blast from the Garuru Cannon that hits all foes with a chance of freezing.
cobblemon.move.survivalprotocol.desc: The user accesses their vast databank of procedures, and selects a precisely calculated healing move to sustain them in the current situation, though it is unlikely the same one will be done twice.
cobblemon.move.swarmsignal.desc: The user spreads Pheromones onto the field for five turns, boosts all Bug and Poison type's Speed and Accuracy by one stage.
cobblemon.move.swiftcosmic.desc: Star-shaped rays are shot at opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.
cobblemon.move.swindle.desc: Hustles the foe, causing them to drop money.
cobblemon.move.symphony.desc: The user hums a melody that boosts its side's Attack and Speed.
cobblemon.move.symphonysound.desc: The user hums a melody that boosts its side's Attack and Speed.
cobblemon.move.synapticbleed.desc: The user strategically attacks the target's synapse causing it to bleed. If the target is a Psychic-Type this move will double in power and it may flinch.
cobblemon.move.syntheticevolution.desc: The user channels its Z-Power and slams onto the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.
cobblemon.move.syntheticsurge.desc: The user unleashes a surge of synthetic energy. This may also raise the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
cobblemon.move.tagout.desc: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting and passes along any stat changes.
cobblemon.move.taiga.desc: Tears the foe with a flurry of claws. High critical hit ratio.
cobblemon.move.tailwindwind.desc: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups the Speed stats of the user and its allies for four turns.
cobblemon.move.talongash.desc: The user attacks the target with its powerful strong talons. The target is hit twice in a row.
cobblemon.move.tartantrum.desc: The user throws powerful tar-fists at his foe. It may also lower the foes' Speed stat.
cobblemon.move.tempest.desc: The user whips up a powerful squall that inflicts damage and clears the skies of all weather.
cobblemon.move.tendril.desc: The user strikes the foe with a slimy tendril. This lowers the Speed stats of those hit.
cobblemon.move.terrafirm.desc: The user tenses itself to bulk up its body, raising both its Attack and Defense stats at the cost of lowering its speed.
cobblemon.move.terraforce.desc: The user hurls a scorching ball of energy that strikes every Pokemon around it.
cobblemon.move.terrorize.desc: The target is subjected to visions of unimaginable horror. It may also cause confusion.
cobblemon.move.thicketslip.desc: The user slips into a thicket of bushes to raise its Speed and Evasion stats.
cobblemon.move.thornwhip.desc: The target is struck with thick spiked vines. High critical hit ratio.
cobblemon.move.thundercrush.desc: The user delivers an electric double chop with its forearms crossed. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.
cobblemon.move.thunderslash.desc: The foe is slashed with an electrified blade. Critical hits land easier.
cobblemon.move.thunderstorm.desc: Summons a five-turn thunderstorm to boost the power of Electric-Types.
cobblemon.move.thunderstruck.desc: The user charges at the target using every bit of its power. The user must rest on the next turn.
cobblemon.move.thundertorm.desc: Summons a five-thurn thunderstorm that will boost the power of electric types.
cobblemon.move.tidaldragoon.desc: The user hits the target with blasts of energy two to five times in a row.
cobblemon.move.tikitorch.desc: The user flings a burning piece of wood at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.
cobblemon.move.titanichorn.desc: Using its tough and impressive horn, the user rams into the target with no letup.
cobblemon.move.tornado.desc: The user attacks everything around it by invading its surroundings with a giant tornado.
cobblemon.move.toxibolle.desc: The user uses its stored poison to generate poisonous bubbles that act like a water/poison type move.
cobblemon.move.toxifume.desc: Amplifies user the first turn, then attacks with toxins.
cobblemon.move.toycarcrash.desc: The User crashes into the Target with an array of toy cars.
cobblemon.move.toyhammer.desc: The user slams its comically large toy hammer into the target to attack. This also damages the user quite a lot.
cobblemon.move.trematerra.desc: Thanks to its vibration manipulation, the user can generate a powerful earthquake that acts like a ground/sound type move.
cobblemon.move.trickshot.desc: The user distracts the target, then shoots them with small rocks or other pellets. This may also make the target flinch.
cobblemon.move.trojanhorse.desc: The User launches an unassuming attack at their Target, if the Target is switching out, the power of this attack will double.
cobblemon.move.turbofalata.desc: The whirlwinds generated by the user are so sharp that they act like a flying/steel type move.
cobblemon.move.twirlenade.desc: A chaotic dance that grants power but causes confusion.
cobblemon.move.twisterwind.desc: The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at opposing Pokémon. The move may use Dragon-Type or Wind-Type. This may also make them flinch.
cobblemon.move.typhoon.desc: The user is whipped around by a strong typhoon. It may also lower the target's accuracy.
cobblemon.move.typhoonhook.desc: The target is hit with a punch that spins and twirls it through a gust of wind. This may also leave the target confused.
cobblemon.move.undegradeable.desc: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
cobblemon.move.universalcutter.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
cobblemon.move.upgrade.desc: The user upgrades its own components. This sharply raises the user’s Attack stat.
cobblemon.move.upheaval.desc: The user makes the ground around the target unstable. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
cobblemon.move.uproarsound.desc: The user attacks in an uproar for three turns. During that time, no Pokémon can fall asleep.
cobblemon.move.uraniumheatbeam.desc: The target is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming irradiated fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.
cobblemon.move.usbwhip.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.
cobblemon.move.uvray.desc: The user shoots a concentrated ray of sunshine at its target. This may also leave the target with a burn.
cobblemon.move.vanish.desc: The user becomes nigh invisible using its ghost body. This sharply raises its evasiveness.
cobblemon.move.veiledsky.desc: Summons an eclipse that blackens the field.
cobblemon.move.veilofoblivion.desc: The user covers the target with its Z-Power and attacks the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.
cobblemon.move.velvetscales.desc: The user places a trap with their scales. The trap weakens opponents that switch into battle.
cobblemon.move.venomswipe.desc: The user swipes around its venomous tail aimlessly. This may poison struck targets.
cobblemon.move.vexation.desc: Blows a soft, chilling curse onto the target to inflict frostbite.
cobblemon.move.virugait.desc: A venomous charge that raises the user's Speed.
cobblemon.move.virusskater.desc: The user skates through digital data, hitting the foe with a nasty blow. Raises the user's Speed.
cobblemon.move.virusskaterdigital.desc: The user skates through digital data, hitting the foe with a nasty blow. Raises the user's Speed.
cobblemon.move.viscosityslam.desc: The User harnesses their inner stickiness to ram into their Target hard, this move prevents the target from switching out.
cobblemon.move.viscousmimicry.desc: The user molds its body into copying any stat change made by the target.
cobblemon.move.voidstar.desc: The user devours the energy of its target and restores its HP by half the damage taken.
cobblemon.move.vulcanshammer.desc: The foe is struck with a spark generating Hammer. It may leave the target with a burn.
cobblemon.move.warble.desc: The user sings in an endearing way, making opposing Pokémon less wary. This lowers their Attack stats.
cobblemon.move.warblesound.desc: The user sings in an endearing way, making opposing Pokémon less wary. This lowers their Attack stats.
cobblemon.move.wavedash.desc: The user teaches its allies how to do a technique that ups the Speed stats of the user and its allies for four turns.
cobblemon.move.webball.desc: A sticky blob of web is flung at the target, restricting its movement and lowering speed.
cobblemon.move.webwrecker.desc: The user recklessly fires a powerful shot of destructive energy. Hits the entire field.
cobblemon.move.weepywail.desc: A sharp wail that reduces the foe's Special Attack.
cobblemon.move.whirlwindwind.desc: The target is blown away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.
cobblemon.move.whisperbeyondtheveil.desc: The user summons its Z-Power and attacks the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.
cobblemon.move.whiteout.desc: The user charges forward, manifesting a hail storm that leaves everything in its path with frostbite.
cobblemon.move.whitewand.desc: The user waves an ice-riddled wand, inflicting the target with frostbite.
cobblemon.move.wickedlash.desc: A vicious 2-turn attack. Has a high critical-hit ratio.
cobblemon.move.wilddance.desc: The user attacks the target by pushing it to the beat for two to three turns, then gets confused.
cobblemon.move.wildfirefakemon.desc: The user sparks up a firestorm, intensifying Sun on the battlefield and leaving everything in its viscinity burned.
cobblemon.move.wildroar.desc: An ear shattering roar that lowers the foe's Attack.
cobblemon.move.wildroarsound.desc: An ear shattering roar that lowers the foe's Attack.
cobblemon.move.windshear.desc: The user beats its wings at blinding speeds, creating a damaging surge of wind. If the user attacks before the target, its power is doubled.
cobblemon.move.wormhole.desc: The user rips a hole in space- always striking first.
cobblemon.move.wormholecosmic.desc: The user rips a hole in space- always striking first.
cobblemon.move.yoink.desc: The user attacks and steals the target’s held item simultaneously. The user can’t steal anything if it already holds an item.
cobblemon.move.yuckytongue.desc: The target is licked with a long tongue. It may paralyze the foe.
cobblemon.move.zamalgamate.desc: Raises Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed by 1 stage.
cobblemon.move.zbasilisksglare.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack by 1.
cobblemon.move.zconversiondigital.desc: Raises Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed by 1 stage.
cobblemon.move.zcopypaste.desc: Raises Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed by 1 stage.
cobblemon.move.zcrystallization.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack by 1.
cobblemon.move.zdarkbargain.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack by 1.
cobblemon.move.zdiscofever.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack by 1.
cobblemon.move.zdragonify.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack by 1.
cobblemon.move.zeevoboost.desc: Raises Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed by 1 stage.
cobblemon.move.zenithbreak.desc: The user attacks the target with great power. However, this also lowers the user’s Attack and Defense stats.
cobblemon.move.zevaporate.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack by 1.
cobblemon.move.zombiestrike.desc: The user thrusts with a ghostly arm, striking the opponent with a physical presence.
cobblemon.move.zreplicate.desc: Raises Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed by 1 stage.
cobblemon.move.zsleeptalksound.desc: Boosts critical-hit ratio by 2 stages, calls a Z-move
